description:
Learn to attract more luck in your life teaches you how to attract more good luck in your life and also change your bad persisting bad luck into good luck using affirmations,visualization and self hypnosis techniques . The techniques taught are very simple yet powerful and can be easily carried out to attract good luck and goal setting.

The techniques used in this course are-

  • Introduction to the course
  • Learn how to attract more luck at your will
  • Start getting lucky using affirmations
  • Rules to being lucky
  • How to trust your intuitions
  • How to set SMART goals and attract good luck
  • How to change your bad luck into good luck
  • Exercise on attracting good luck using self hypnosis and anchoring
  • Learn how to relax using visualization
  • Learn how to attract luck cycles in your life
  • Summary of the course
title: Learn To Attract More Luck In Your Life Using NLP
